name: A Hell of a Journey
description:
Recommended Full Screen. To restart the game reach the end or close and open a new tab.

A glorious adventure with an unreliable narrator. Live the experience of Hell and reach Beatrice and Purgatory with your friend Virgil.  Will they reach Beatrice? Or they will get stuck in Hell? An experience made in Twine.

Game Designer and Writer:  @arirav

Game Designer and Game Developer:   @chris_eru99

Game Designer and Illustrator:  @EmmaTheJane
